about.description:
The OpenMP subproject of LLVM contains the components required to build an
executable OpenMP program that are outside the compiler itself.

name: llvm-openmp
raw_recipe:

    string: hcfea43d_1
requirements:

about:
    description: 'The OpenMP subproject of LLVM contains the components required to
        build an

        executable OpenMP program that are outside the compiler itself.

    home: http://openmp.llvm.org/
    license: MIT license or UIUC License
    license_family: Other
    license_file: projects/openmp/LICENSE.txt
    summary: Support for the OpenMP language
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true

The OpenMP subproject of LLVM contains the components required to build an
executable OpenMP program that are outside the compiler itself.
